我叫王路远，本科毕业于华中科技大学，通信工程专业。虽然我的专业更偏重于硬件，但我也非常喜欢软件编程。

但我并不想变成一个“技术宅”。我喜欢看电影，和朋友出去玩儿，以及各种各样的体育运动。游泳、射箭、滑雪、羽毛球……谈不上对这些运动有多么精通，只是为了开心而已。
毕竟，做人最重要的就是开心！

descriptionList.title: Fuzzy Navigation System for Mobile Robots
descriptionList.detailInfo: This is a navigation system that can guide a mobile robot moving to the desired destination without hitting into obstacles. To test the system, we first build a simple simulation environment using Python. The simulator can allow us to put different shapes of obstacles and tell the robot the readings of its virtual sensors. Then, we use Fuzzy Logic to teach the robot some basic fuzzy rules, for example, "If the obstacle is close to the left, then turn right for a little bit". The outputs of the fuzzy engine are defuzzified and used to drive the robot.

data.title: Smart Road System
data.detail:
This project is an early prototype of a smart road system. There are 4 cameras that cover the whole lab. Each camera is connected to a computer. Using image processing, I can precisely detect the position of the front point and the end point of a car in the image frame. As the cameras are calibrated, those positions can be converted into the world frame. Thus the 3D position and orientation of a given car can be calculated.
To control the mini-car through the Wi-Fi network, we replace the built-in remote controller with Raspberry-Pi. PWM waves are generated and control the servo motor and the DC motor. The 4 computers share information through the Ethernet network, and each of them has a separate Wi-Fi network card and acts as a small base station. To make the mini-car able to roam across different base stations, the network card on the mini-car works in a connectionless way.
The lane-keeping controller is a PID controller. Given the position and status of a mini-car, we can calculate a virtual target position. As the car is moving, the virtual target is also moving. So, the car can run along the lane stably.
We use ROS as our inter-computers communication framework. As all the information is transmitting through ROS, we use Rviz to visualize the status of the system, which is pretty helpful for debugging.
I designed and implemented the entire software system, as well as part of the hardware system.

data.title: A Hand Gesture Recognizer based on Machine Learning
data.detail:
We use HOG, LBP and skin color as the key features. To get a better performance, PCA is used to reduce the dimension. 
In order to detect the position of the hand, we use 3 different sizes of sliding windows to scan the image. Then, a heat-map is generated and the "hottest" location is most likely represent hand.
The sub-image is then fed into the next classifier to classify gestures. 5 different gestures can be recognized, including open-hand, thumb-up, and so on. As you can see, the gesture recognizer is able to tell both the position and the gesture class in a relatively complicated image.
Instead of download training sets from the Internet, we collect hundreds of images by ourselves.

data.title: LLVM循环优化对比
data.detail: 本项目通过4个简单的C语言程序，测试了4种LLVM循环优化算法。对比了优化前和优化后的汇编和LLVM IR代码的差异。使用gem5模拟器测试了在单种优化方式下运行耗时以及缓存性能的差异。最后，4种循环优化算法与无优化、最高级别优化一起应用到了Polybench上进行了对比测试。

data.title: 机器人翻倒纠正
data.detail: 通过旋转移动平台上沉重的机械臂控制机器人的重心，使之通过崎岖地形时不易翻倒。模拟器采用了V-REP平台。机器人模型结合了两种V-REP自带的模型，并调整了参数。通过翻倒实验可以估计出机器人的重心。最后，Lua代码和Matlab进行通信，控制算法由Matlab实现。

data.title: 机器人协作运输物体
data.detail: 桌面上的三台PUMA机器人通过双目摄像头识别、定位并捡起散落在白纸上的黑色圆柱体，放置到地面上的移动机器人上。移动机器人通过编码器和迷宫上粘贴的二维码定位，并在迷宫中按顺序移动到PUMA机器人下方以便接收圆柱体。在迷宫中的导航通过机器人上的红外光传感器和接触传感器以避障的方式实现。所有的机器人（3台PUMA手臂机器人和1台扫地机器人）通过ROS进行通信。

data.title: 社团信息管理网站
data.detail: 具有登录、编辑成员和组别、项目管理、财务计算等功能。前端通过React实现，后端通过Django实现。数据库采用了MySQL。

data.title: 协程调度器
data.detail:
在C语言上实现了协程，并可在多个协程任务之间调度。采用修改函数调用过程中的一系列寄存器实现，因此需要使用汇编语言。
通过简单的调度器，每个任务可以睡眠和“非标准”输出。输出的内容通过Named Pipe在另一个Terminal显示以防干扰系统指令的输入。支持macOS和Linux平台。

data.title: 守门小车
data.detail: 通过一个连接在电脑上的摄像头识别地面上滚动的网球，并预测网球轨迹。在计算出预测的轨迹和“球门”的交点后，电脑通过蓝牙发送指令给小车上的Arduino单片机。小车可以提前运动到交点出将网球拦截。为了方便调试，在Mac端使用Swift语言开发了带有图形界面的应用程序，可以可视化地展示出网球位置及预测的轨迹。蓝牙通信部分使用了CoreBluetooth框架。

data.title: 背它

data.title: PlutoSDR移动通信
data.detail: 使用PlutoSDR构建了一个简易的移动通信系统，并实现了滑动窗口和停止等待两个协议。文本或二进制文件可在此基础上实现可靠传输。

data.title: 超声波体感游戏
data.detail:
通过在FPGA上下载IP核模拟一颗单片机，根据超声波传感器的读数控制屏幕上两个小球的距离。玩家需要控制手掌距离超声波传感器的距离控制小球避开掉落的障碍物。
屏幕显示通过操作VGA接口实现。
